turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Want to order three large gluten-free crust pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great and what toppings did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: First one, Mediterranean. Second one, chicken ranch pizza. And the third is let's go with spinach deluxe.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: But tale off the onions on the spinach logs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can you repeat the first one please, there was a little static on my end.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you get it that time?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 3 large gluten free crust pizzas, one Mediterranean, one chicken ranch, and one spinach deluxe, no onions totaling out to $76.88 okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Yeah, you got it right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great your pizza will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and you'll get the reciept via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. I'll look for it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem. You have a good day.
